text: The Utah Valley Symphony was organized in 1959 with about 30 members and an initial audience of eleven people. Today the orchestra has grown to between 75 and 80 members and gives multiple performances to accommodate demand. The Symphony performs 6 concerts a season at the Covey Center for the Arts, in Provo, Utah, USA. ==External links== * The Official Site of the Utah Valley Symphony * Covey Center for the Arts Category:Musical groups established in 1959 Category:American orchestras Category:Musical groups from Utah Category:1959 establishments in Utah Category:Performing arts in Utah
title: Utah Valley Symphony
